question.short: Do birth control pills cause weight gain?
question.long: Do birth control pills cause weight gain?

description: Results from studies evaluating the impact of birth control pill use on body weight.

no_consensus.description: The literature has not yet reached a consensus on the effects of birth control pills on body weight

no.description: The literature suggests that birth control pills do not cause weight gain

towards_no.description: The literature suggests that birth control pills probably don't cause weight gain, but more research is needed

towards_yes.description: The literature suggests that birth control pills may cause weight gain, but more research is needed

yes.description: The literature suggests that birth control pills cause weight gain

no.description: The results of the paper show no significant effect of the birth control pills evaluated on body weight

no_unlike_literature.description: The results of the paper show no significant effect of the birth control pills evaluated on body weight, unlike what is reported in the literature

no_but_mixed_results.description: The results of the paper show no significant overall effect of the birth control pills evaluated on body weight, but there are mixed results on specific cases

maybe.description: The results of the paper suggest that the birth control pills evaluated might have an effect on body weight, but the evidence is not strong enough to conclude

yes_but_low_confidence.description: The results of the paper suggest that the birth control pills evaluated may cause weight gain, but the evidence is not strong

yes_but_small_effect.description: The results of the paper suggest that the birth control pills evaluated may have a small effect on body weight

yes_unlike_literature.description: The results of the paper suggest that the birth control pills evaluated may cause weight gain, unlike what is reported in the literature

yes.description: The results of the paper suggest that the birth control pills evaluated cause weight gain
